Activity: Log in to the hospital's EHR system, check emails, and prioritize tasks for the week based on urgency and importance.
Review the current EHR integration systems and gather insights on areas needing improvement or attention.
Collaborate with @EHR Vendor Liaison to discuss the latest software updates and patches related to EHR systems.
Conduct an analysis session with @Data Analyst and @Health Informatics Specialist on current healthcare data trends and requirements.
Document findings from the morning sessions and draft development specifications for upcoming tasks.
Meet with @Clinical Lead to align on EHR functionality expectations to ensure compliance with clinical standards.
Set up the development environment and test the integration points with the existing EHR systems.
Send a summary email of the day's accomplishments to @IT Project Manager and relevant team members.
